mapper.select: SELECT c.*, u.nick FROM comm c JOIN users u ON(c.uCode = u.uCode) WHERE c.bdCode = #{bdCode} ORDER BY c.replyCode DESC, c.comRecy DESC
SELECT c.*, u.nick FROM comm c JOIN users u ON(c.uCode = u.uCode) WHERE c.bdCode = #{bdCode} ORDER BY c.replyCode DESC, c.comCode desc

SELECT c.comcode, c.comcont, c.comrecy, c.comrecn, c.bdcode, c.uCode, c.replycode, u.nick, CASE WHEN c.comCode = (SELECT replycode FROM comm WHERE comcode = #{comCode}) then 1 else 0 END AS inx FROM comm c JOIN users u ON(c.uCode = u.uCode) WHERE c.bdCode = #{bdCode} ORDER BY REPLYCODE DESC, inx desc
SELECT comCode FROM comm WHERE uCode = #{uCode} AND replyCode IS NULL
SELECT comCode FROM comm WHERE uCode = #{uCode} AND replyCode IS NOT NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE comm SET comCont = #{comCont} WHERE comCode = #{comCode} AND uCode = #{uCode} AND bdCode = #{bdCode}

UPDATE comm SET comRecy = comRecy - 1 WHERE comCode = #{comCode}
UPDATE comm SET comRecn = comRecn + 1 WHERE comCode = #{comCode}
UPDATE comm SET comRecn = comRecn - 1 WHERE comCode = #{comCode}
UPDATE comm_reco SET reco = #{reco} WHERE comCode = #{comCode} AND uCode = #{uCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comm_reco WHERE comCode = #{comCode} AND uCode = #{uCode}
mapper.select: SELECT comCode, reco FROM comm_reco WHERE comCode IN (SELECT comCode FROM comm WHERE bdCode = #{bdCode}) AND uCode = #{uCode}
